cliMode.description: CLI mode for execution of user-flows. This is useful when you debug or write tests. (DEFAULT | SANDBOX | CI)

ufPath.description: Path to user-flow file or folder containing user-flow files to run. (`*.uf.ts` or`*.uf.js`)

serveCommand.description: Runs a npm script to serve the target app. This has to be used in combination with `--awaitServeStdout`

awaitServeStdout.description: Waits for stdout from the serve command to start collecting user-flows ()

outPath.description: Output folder for the user-flow reports

outputPath.description: Output folder for the user-flow reports

openReport.description: Opens file automatically after the user-flow is captured

dryRun.description: When true the user-flow test will get executed without measures (for fast development)
